channel.title: Comments on: What’s My Name? Of Calligraphy and Kowtowing
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/what-is-my-name-of-calligraphy-and-kowtowing/#comment-306">dianekepler</a>.
Thank you! I was feeling guilty about not enough BDSM in this post. So it's a great relief to hear that you think it's worth reading about anyway. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to dianekepler.

Thank you! I was feeling guilty about not enough BDSM in this post. So it’s a great relief to hear that you think it’s worth reading about anyway. :)

item.title: By: dianekepler
item.dc:creator: dianekepler
item.description: It's great to hear the story behind your glyph. At first it reminded me of the symbol for tea, but this is way better.
item.content:encoded: It’s great to hear the story behind your glyph. At first it reminded me of the symbol for tea, but this is way better.
